description: Information relevant to how a biomaterial or file was converted into another biomaterial or file.
title: Process core
name: process_core

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

process_id.description: A unique ID for the process.

process_name.description: A short, descriptive name for the process that need not be unique.

process_description.description: A general description of the process.

location.description: Location where the process took place.
location.example: Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute; Cancer Institute Stanford University

operators.description: Identifier for individual(s) who executed the process.
operators.guidelines: Enter either the name(s) or identifier(s) of the individual(s).
